answers.answer: It seems a little high but I don't think it is anything to worry about. What did the doctor say. Maybe it is twins!!! Here is a website you can look at: http://www.bobrow.net/kimberly/birth/hcglevels.htmlGood luck on the 3 hour, that drink tastes awful!

Well all the nurse said was my number looked great and no need to test again. Well if it is twins they would be identical since the us only showed one sac. Yeah that drink is awful and i cant stand it.
I think it is a cruel joke to take an already nauseous pregnant woman and make her drink that stuff!Identical twins! How exciting would that be!!!

Yeah it is a little cruel if you ask me but thankfully my mornings are not bad. I get sick in the afternoons and after i eat. I honestly dont want twins so im hoping there is only one baby. I also hope this is my sticky bean because i could not handle another loss.
I'm sure everything will be fine. I'm sending you some SSBD!

Sounds like things are going well and I'm sure this bean is nice and sticky :) Especially when your having m/s.Wow, here in Canada they dont make you do the gestational diabetes test until 28 weeks, I'm having mine done next week, and I'm getting scared about it because I've been having trouble with my weight.

question: Well as some of you know i had my first appointment 7/27 and by ultrasound i measured 5w2d. Today my lab work came back and my hcg was 28,059, is that normal? Also did a glucose and they wanted that to be between 90-130 and mine came back at 131 so they want me to do the 3 hour. I hope all goes well tuesday when i do the 3 hour.
title: Hcg level normal???
